column1: "description": "The table refers to the state's net domestic product at constant prices for the base year 2004-05. The estimate of net state domestic product is arrived at by deducting the consumption of fixed capital from the gross state domestic product for each sector."
"title": "Download CSV for Sikkim Net State Domestic Product at factor cost at Constant Prices for the base year 2004-05"
Real estate, ownership of dwelling and business
